Tom, you've fixed a bug in IndentAction shortly after I200409240800

This has nothing to do with the fix I put in. Seems strange that this happens,
since TextViewer::validateSelectionRange checks for that case (selection within
a multi-char line delimiter is illegal) explicitely.  Moving back to inbox.
